title: Get a quick cuddle from a furry friend in need of a home as Bunnings host pet drive
text:
If dogs, barbecues, and home improvement sound like your ideal weekend, Bunnings is the place to be this Sunday.

The hardware franchise is hosting pet re-homing organisation Second Chance Animal Rescue in some New South Wales store on October 6.

The organisation will brings a selection of pups in need of a new home along to the stores for a national adoption drive.

If dogs, barbecues, and home improvement sound like your ideal weekend, Bunnings is the place to be this Sunday

The not-profit organisation rescues and re-homes cats and dogs who have found themselves in need of owners.

You can head along to the Bunnings listed below to cuddle an adorable furry friend and - if you're keen to take them home - you can chat to one of the volunteers.

There is the option to adopt immediately or talk about adopting in the future.

To get your puppy pats and maybe a barbecue lunch head along to Bunnings Castle Hill, Bunnings Bathurst, Bunnings West Hoxton, Bunnings South Nowra, or Bunnings McGraths Hill between 11am and 2pm.
description: If dogs, barbecues, and home improvement sound like your ideal weekend, some Bunnings stores in New South Wales are the place to be this Sunday.
authors: Brett Lackey For Daily Mail Australia
